title: If a person uploads an e-book on KDP but then sees the odd error in spelling, punctuation, etc., is it easy to go back and correct? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, it’s easy to upload a new version. The issue is, it’s hard to ensure that those who have already bought the eBook get the latest copy. It’s dependent on their individual settings. So you may have some ereaders that have the original version and others that have the new one.

Yes, very. You simply correct the original, then upload it as a new version. However, Amazon, unlike some other publishers, won’t let you upload the new version until after the old one has been published.
